name: Solitaire Seasons
description:
The all new FREE Solitaire featuring beautiful seasonal themes!

The best FREE Solitaire experience for your iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad.

★ The best looking Solitaire app on the store.
★ 22 BEAUTIFUL custom themes with more to come.
★ Draw one or draw three gameplay.
★ Super simple auto move controls.
★ Landscape and portrait orientation.
★ Left or right handed play.
★ Slick interface and animations.
★ Statistics tracking.
★ Free updates including more theme packs.


Please be sure to check out other apps by Banana & Co. including Spider Solitaire and Freecell!

Thanks for playing!
